Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: An orally active inhibitor of coagulation factor Xa with anticoagulant activity. Apixaban directly inhibits factor Xa, thereby interfering with the conversion of prothrombin to thrombin and preventing formation of cross-linked fibrin clots.
